name: Bendy Run II
description:
This is a small horror fangame inspired by Batim (and not Batds, as it was programmed before that) originally made on Scratch, and published on Itch. It's a small survival simulator, where you play as Boris (or one of the selectable characters) and have to survive Bendy for as long as you can.

Instructions :

Press space to pause and select parameters and view instructions for modes
( all needed information is in the pause menu. click on the i button to view mode instructions, press g to view general info, press k to view keyboard shortcuts ).

General info :

use arrow/wasd keys to move Boris (default character)
Don't get caught by Bendy (the demon)
Don't stay too close to bendy or he will become ink Bendy and become stronger. Stay alive as long as you can to improve your score
Press M to mute/unmute
more info in the pause menu.

can also be played on scratch : https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/303903833/
and on Gamejolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/Bendy-Run-II/471990

if you liked this game try playing BATIM escape game https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/368827439/

credits to Joey Drew Studios for the original game and soundtrack and characters and everything

NOT AN OFFICIAL BENDY AND THE INK MACHINE PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH JOEY DREW STUDIOS INC

official joey drew studios website :

https://joeydrewstudios.com

#fangame #horror #survival #multiplayer
